meanings.sent1: Many people around the world support antifascisms.
meanings.sent2: His strong antifascisms led him to join the protest.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed its antifascisms by hissing at the dictator in the movie.
meanings.sent4: Her passion for antifascisms burned like a fierce flame.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's dedication to antifascisms inspired her students to stand up against injustice.

meanings.definition: The belief in or advocacy of antifascism.
meanings.sent1: Her unwavering antifascisms made her a respected figure in the community.
meanings.sent2: The organization's antifascisms was evident in their mission statement.
meanings.sent3: The antifascisms of the children shone brightly during the school assembly.
meanings.sent4: In her heart, a seed of antifascisms blossomed into a mighty tree.
meanings.sent5: The power of antifascisms united people from all walks of life against tyranny.

meanings.definition: Actions or movements aimed at combating fascism.
meanings.sent1: The antifascisms of the group was evident in their peaceful protests.
meanings.sent2: Their antifascisms included organizing rallies and spreading awareness.
meanings.sent3: The antifascisms of the penguins against the walrus was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: In the face of adversity, their antifascisms stood strong like a fortress.
meanings.sent5: The world celebrated the heroes whose antifascisms brought down the oppressive regime.
